Errors.mets-003: metsOBJID attribute does not contain a properly formatted ARK
Errors.mets-032: mets@PROFILE attribute does not contain a properly formatted ARK
Errors.dmd-002: dmdSec@ID\='dc' must have mdWrap@MDTYPE\='DC' as a child element
Errors.dmd-006: dmdSec@ID\='mods' must have mdWrap@MDTYPE\='OTHER' and @OTHERMDTYPE\='MODS' as a child element
Errors.dmd-011: dmdSec@ID\='ead' must have mdRef@MDTYPE\='EAD' as a child element
Errors.dmd-021: dmdSec@ID\='repo' must have mdWrap@MDTYPE\='DC' as a child element
Errors.amd-001: a METS can only have one(1) amdSec
Errors.amd-010: a techMD section must contain xmlData that conforms to MIX
Errors.amd-020: a rightsMD section must contain xmlData that conforms to METSRights
Errors.file-001: file elements must have USE attributes
Errors.file-002: file@USE attributes must not be empty
Errors.file-010: file elements must have ID attributes
Errors.file-011: file@ID attributes must not be empty
Errors.file-020: file elements must have a FLocat child element
Errors.file-022: file/FLocat elements must not be empty
Errors.file-040: file@USE or fGrp@USE = 'archive image' must occur where the object is a TIFF
Errors.file-050: file elements must have fileGrp parent
Errors.struct-001: a METS can only have one(1) structMap
Errors.struct-010: div element must have a @DMDID associated with it
